mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.create_at, b.update_at, b.views, b.status, u.user_id FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no AND u.admin = 0 AND b.status = 'Y' ORDER BY b.board_id DESC

SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.create_at, b.update_at, b.views, b.status, u.user_id FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (user_no, title, content, create_at, views, status) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, 'Y');
mapper.update: UPDATE board b JOIN users u ON b.user_no = u.user_no SET b.title = #{title}, b.content = #{content}, b.update_at = NOW(), b.views = #{views}, u.user_id = #{userId} WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId};
